instructions: To get started go to m.me/Spotify and add Spotify to Facebook Messenger. This will open up your Facebook Messenger in a browser and you ll find yourself at the start of a new conversation with the Spotify app. Click Get Started. The bot can walk you through the features. Once you re ready to create a playlist go to Facebook Messenger on your phone. Unfortunately, this feature only works from a phone you can t create playlists from the web version of Facebook Messenger. Open up a conversation with a friend and tap + > Spotify . You can send an individual song without connecting your Spotify and Facebook accounts, but if you want to create group playlists, you ll have to tap the Connect Spotify button and grant Facebook access to your Spotify account. Once access is granted, return to Facebook Messenger and tap the Create Group Playlist and enter a name for your playlist. You can continue to add songs to playlist by going back to the conversation, but once the playlist is created, you can also add songs as you would normally through the Spotify desktop or mobile apps.
